name: Moorhuhn Invasion (Crazy Chicken Invasion)
description: Alien chickens invade and beam everything away. Greet them with your shotgun.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Minimum Processor: 1 GHz Dual Core Minimum. Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Open GL 2 capable Graphics Card Sound Card: any

reviews.review_text: Great timewaster specially if you are 20+ years old, personally i prefer winter version over this one, but still this game is great if you feel like shooting something into the feathered face,

I play this game on my laptop/tablet convertable every now and then for a game or two. It's a fun game for a few minutes. Only downside for me is that I have to connect my keyboard as in tabled mode I can't fill in the highscore.
